resources.string: Well, it\'s just plain unfortunate to lose on a spin and has nothing to do with your skills whatsoever. Hopefully you have better luck next time
Maybe read a dictionary so you won\'t guess on the wrong letter next time
Congratulations, you won the game \n\n With %1$s points you must be a true walking dictionary
You just lost a life from your wrong guess and have %1$s left
You just got an extra life from your spin
You just lost a life from your spin and have %1$s left
You went bankrupt on your spin and lost all of your lives
